message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. I know it's worth a lot to you, and this is a fair price for both of us. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I really like the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to come down to $13000. This is still a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
I'm still a bit far from $13000. I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure it's within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to go down to $12500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product for you. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I'm getting close, but I still need to save a bit more. I'm willing to go up to $12000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at $12000?
